pageContent.emailHeader: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:16pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px; padding:0 0 0 5px; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">E-mail</Introtext>
pageContent.title: Meeting with Dr. Hayes
pageContent.emailContent:
I wanted to let you know that after we spoke last time, I met with Dr. Hayes and told him about your plan to meet with his nurse and staff. However, he was still pretty concerned about the administrative difficulties we may have with your product. Even though you seem committed to coming up with a solution for us, I think Dr. Hayes just wants to meet and hear it straight from you. When can you come back?

Will Bennett
